findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
findings.description: The internal function _mint allows minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected function calls in Ownable contract
findings.description: The Ownable contract contains unprotected function calls which can be modified by an unauthorized user.

findings.title: Lack of input validation in transfer and approve functions
findings.description: The transfer and approve functions lack input validation, which can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unprotected internal functions _transfer, _mint, _burn, _approve, _spendAllowance, _beforeTokenTransfer, and _afterTokenTransfer
findings.description: The internal functions _transfer, _mint, _burn, _approve, _spendAllowance, _beforeTokenTransfer, and _afterTokenTransfer are not protected, which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of the contract's state.

findings.title: Centralization risk due to owner privileges
findings.description: The contract has an active ownership which creates a centralization risk of rug pull scams and allows owners to cash out tokens, making them valueless.

findings.title: Risk of unauthorized ownership transfer
findings.description: Active contract ownership poses a risk of centralization, which can lead to rug pull scams or unauthorized ownership transfer.

findings.title: Potential reentrancy attacks through transferFrom function
findings.description: Reentrancy vulnerability exists in the transferFrom function which can lead to potential attacks.

findings.title: Lack of access control in increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance functions
findings.description: The increaseAllowance and decreaseAllowance functions lack proper access control, allowing unauthorized users to modify allowances.
